words.defineEn: a quality of a given color that differs slightly from another color
words.defineVi: chất lượng của một màu nhất định hơi khác so với màu khác

words.defineEn: a prideful and unfriendly manner of behaving that showcases one's belief of being better than others
words.defineVi: một cách cư xử kiêu hãnh và không thân thiện thể hiện niềm tin của một người là tốt hơn những người khác

examples: In his leisure time he follows West Ham United.
It's true what they say, the busiest men have the most leisure.
She had a job which never got in the way of her leisure interests.
The procrastinator complained about not having enough time to pursue their hobbies, but idle folk have the least leisure, and their lack of productivity left them with little free time.
Mary spent her days in pointless leisure while her potential wasted away, proving that as good be an addled egg as an idle bird.
words.defineEn: a time for relaxing when one is free from duties and can spend one's time doing fun activities
words.defineVi: thời gian để thư giãn khi một người rảnh rỗi và có thể dành thời gian cho các hoạt động vui chơi

words.defineEn: an apparatus for visual signaling with lights or mechanically moving arms
words.defineVi: một thiết bị để báo hiệu hình ảnh bằng đèn hoặc cánh tay chuyển động cơ học

words.defineEn: a singer of folk songs
words.defineVi: một ca sĩ dân ca

examples: Spiders play a central role in a lot of Japanese folklore.
The heroes and heroines in these Baba Yaga tales carryover from the folklore because of problem solving, hard work, and courage they exhibit.
Oral folklore, religion, and literary history all have a hand in creating this monster.
The okapi, giant panda, the komodo dragon, even the mountain gorilla were all discovered, at least in part, thanks to folklore.
Blood-sucking monsters had already been part of folklore for at least 800 years.
words.defineEn: the traditional beliefs, customs, stories, and legends of a particular community, usually passed down through generations by word of mouth
words.defineVi: tín ngưỡng, phong tục, câu chuyện và truyền thuyết truyền thống của một cộng đồng cụ thể, thường được truyền miệng qua nhiều thế hệ

examples: In the late 1960s and early 70s, after years of almost a complete stupor, they suddenly woke up.
And when you lose them in a drunken stupor, you won't even care, because Daddy's trust fund's gonna take care of you just fine.
words.defineEn: the feeling of distress and disbelief that you have when something bad happens accidentally
words.defineVi: cảm giác đau khổ và hoài nghi mà bạn có khi điều gì đó tồi tệ vô tình xảy ra

words.defineEn: a man of rank in the ancient regime
words.defineVi: một người đàn ông cấp bậc trong chế độ cổ đại

words.defineEn: a laborer who loads and unloads vessels in a port
words.defineVi: một người lao động bốc dỡ tàu ở cảng

words.defineEn: a position that is not demanding or difficult but pays well
words.defineVi: một vị trí không đòi hỏi hoặc khó khăn nhưng được trả lương cao

examples: But in the meantime, the issue has become a bellwether of the larger conversation about mass incarceration in the United States.
Do you see yourself as a bellwether stock for that?

- Do you see yourselves as kind of a bellwether for the next round of big unicorn IPOs, you know, the AirBnBs and Spotifys and Lyfts of the world who are thinking about IPOing soon into this kind of shaky market right now?
But if you're in that environment and sleep-deprived, it is a bellwether sign that you're not getting enough sleep.
And so, as Argentina has been a bellwether for the region, for marriage and gender, could we see similar votes on abortion following Argentina's vote?
words.defineEn: someone who assumes leadership of a movement or activity
words.defineVi: một người đảm nhận vai trò lãnh đạo của một phong trào hoặc hoạt động

examples: Are you acting as the purveyor of truth?
It has arguably gone from sports sedan purveyor to a high end family wagon maker.
It has arguably gone from sports sedan purveyor to a high end family wagon maker.
There are even major cheese competitions among purveyors from the U.S., Europe and elsewhere around the world.
It never quite caught up to Macy's and mervyns as a purveyor of affordable goods.
words.defineEn: someone who supplies provisions (especially food)
words.defineVi: ai đó cung cấp các điều khoản (đặc biệt là thực phẩm)

examples: Zephyr makes sense, though.
So this is the Zephyr gaming mouse.
Alone on the crag, Psyche felt Zephyr the West Wind gently lifting her into the air.
words.defineEn: a slight wind (usually refreshing)
words.defineVi: một cơn gió nhẹ (thường là sảng khoái)

examples: It's called Timbre.
The final dimension of timbre is the instrument’s flux.
And finally, the flare of the crater’s rim changes the sound’s timbre, which you can think of as the color of the sound.
With musical Instruments, timbre is partly determined by the way an instrument amplifies or dampens harmonics.
It's known as the timbre or the color of the sound.
words.defineEn: the quality of a sound that is distinct from pitch, intensity and loudness
words.defineVi: chất lượng của âm thanh khác biệt với cao độ, cường độ và âm lượng

words.defineEn: a senior naval officer above the rank of captain
words.defineVi: một sĩ quan hải quân cao cấp trên cấp bậc thuyền trưởng

words.defineEn: an elderly unmarried woman
words.defineVi: một phụ nữ lớn tuổi chưa lập gia đình

examples: When Dr. Blasey Ford testifies, does the tenor of the room change?
And that's when they brought forward Anita Hill, and the whole tenor, of course, changed, and it became a battle not over ideology but over personal behavior.
words.defineEn: the pitch range of the highest male voice
words.defineVi: quãng cao của giọng nam cao nhất

examples: In response, nations have clamored to harvest their local species.
Everyone is clamoring.
But, in New York City, elementary schools reopened, something many parents had clamored for.
It is also a vehicle that plays to Ford's strengths, and it is a fresh entry in the sport utility segment customers are clamoring for.
I’m guessing they’ll have the right to loan out the certificate to other institutions too, who will likely be clamoring to get in on a piece of the banana action.
words.defineEn: a loud harsh or strident noise
words.defineVi: một tiếng ồn lớn gay gắt hoặc gay gắt

words.defineEn: the person who delivers over or commits merchandise
words.defineVi: người giao hàng hoặc cam kết hàng hóa

words.defineEn: a person whose responsibility is to manage the finances of a school, college, or university
words.defineVi: một người có trách nhiệm quản lý tài chính của một trường học, cao đẳng hoặc đại học
